ComicInfo.Summary:
If you're interested in what makes the Hellspawn tick, this one's for you. Hellspawn #7 features one of the most unique perspectives into Spawn's psyche you will ever see. Special artwork by Todd McFarlane helps bring to life this singular event. And... a secret group meeting in a church basement reveals just how far and wide the Spawn legacy reaches. This urban horror masterpiece is brought to you by Eisner Award-winning writer Brian Michael Bendis and multimedia genius Ashley Wood. ... and Miracle Man (Mike Moran)?
Sam & Twitch arrange a meeting with Mike Moran. Having been hung out to dry by the force, Sam & Twitch turn to Moran and offer an exchange of information: The two detectives will give Moran scoops on what's happening within the force, and Moran will supply them with the names of his informants. Meanwhile, John Damascus is in the middle of torturing his predecessor, Jason Wynn, who has lost his mind thanks to Spawn.
ComicInfo.Title: Shed
